attributes.name: manifestId
attributes.description: Manifest ID generated for a request

attributes.name: packageName
attributes.description: e.g. Agent Core / Performance Plugin etc

attributes.name: operatingSystemName
attributes.description: Endpoint Operating system name e.g. windows 10

attributes.name: operatingSystemType
attributes.description: Endpoint Operating system type e.g. windows

attributes.name: installationVariables
attributes.description: A key value pair for Installation variables (e.g. Unique Identification number generated for LMI upon installation)

attributes.name: operation
attributes.description: Operation to be performed for this package on an endpoint
